text: The Taugl or also Tauglbach is a river of the State of Salzburg, Austria. The Taugl rises near the mountains and (in the Salzkammergut Mountains) at a height of approx. . The river flows from south to north into the lake , which is drained by the Almbach. The river has a length of approx. , of which is through a ravine. It is therefore classified as a dangerous white water river. The water quality is classified as A grade. Category:Rivers of Salzburg (state) Category:Rivers of Austria
title: Taugl
